title: FS: High Grade T206 Southern Leaguers and Others at 4Show Frames Card Shop
author: cguidi

posts.post_title: FS: High Grade T206 Southern Leaguers and Others at 4Show Frames Card Shop
posts.post_content:
I am trying to put enough scratch together to get a booth at the National Card Show this summer to exhibit my new graded baseball card display frames.  I have never been to the National but I am trying to this new endeavor as an excuse.  To that end I will be offering some of my cards for sale through the website.  As an added bonus each card will come with a complementary 4Show Frame to help you display your old cardboard like a piece of art.  

For anyone who might be interested I just posted the following cards:

T206 Juan Violat (SL) SGC 60 Ex
T206 J.F. Kiernan (SL) SGC 60 Ex
T206 Jiggs Donohue SGC 80 Ex/NM
T206 Carl Lundgren (Cubs) SGC 30 Good
T213-2 Mike Donlin (.300 Batter 7 Years) SGC 40 VG

To see additional pictures and pricing please check out our listings:

[url]https://www.4showframes.com/card-shop/[/url]
